tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE land_use_monitoring (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  zone_id INT,
  area_name VARCHAR(255),
  land_use_type VARCHAR(50),
  change_date DATE,
  change_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE land_use_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT,
    land_type VARCHAR(255),
    area FLOAT,
    date_effective DATE
)

CREATE TABLE zoning_regulations (
    zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_name VARCHAR(255),
    development_type VARCHAR(255),
    effective_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE policy_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_result VARCHAR(255),
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255)
)
